external_context.description: Summary and information about parent and sibling modules that help contextualize the existence and purpose of this module. This is only present when the module has a parent.

internal_context.description: Summary and information about files directly within this specific module.

exposed_context.description: Summary and information about files directly within this module, as well as any of its children. To be used by sibling modules, and modules outside its internal hierarchy.

delete.description: True if this file should be deleted. For simplicity, moving or renaming files should be handled as a new file creation + existing file deletion.
